about_the_game:
Download Friend Pass to play OctoRaid VR with your PC Player friends for free!

If you own the full OctoRaid VR version of the game, you can play with your friends through a friend pass.

How to play:
  • One player who plays with VR must own the full version of OctoRaid VR game.
  • Download Friend Pass for free.
  • Connect to VR Player's Session and Play Together!
detailed_description:
Download Friend Pass to play OctoRaid VR with your PC Player friends for free!

If you own the full OctoRaid VR version of the game, you can play with your friends through a friend pass.

How to play:
  • One player who plays with VR must own the full version of OctoRaid VR game.
  • Download Friend Pass for free.
  • Connect to VR Player's Session and Play Together!
name: OctoRaid VR Friend's Pass (옥토레이드 친구패스)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 3 Ghz+ (Intel i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 8GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Six Core 4 Ghz + (Intel Core i7 or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Download Friend's Pass* to play OctoRaid VR with your VR friends for free! Download and play Friend Pass for free through a friend who owns the official game!
